Title: User can see homepage
Description:
As a user
When I visit the home page
Then I should see the site name and tag line

Cageflix
Netflix for Nic Cage movies

Title: User can add new movie
Description:
As a user
When I click "Add Movie"
And I fill in the new movie fields and click submit
Then I see the movie information on the home page

See mockups for fields

Title: Movies require valid data
Description:
- name is required
- year is required
- year must be a number

See mockups for error messages

Title: Movies should be sorted by year, most recent first
Description:
As a user
When I visit the home page
Then I should see the movies listed in chronological order (newer movies first)
